Headline: Trains bypassing Garfield Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to police activity.

Shuttle bus service has been requested to provide connecting service between 47th and 63rd.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
